verbs.description: if [ARG1: my zippo] [V: is] [ARG2: in my suitcase] can it be brought on the plane when preparing to take a flight it important to devote adequate time to packing smartly to avoid problems at the airport security checkpoint if you have prohibited items in your suitcase the items will likely be confiscated and you might face a lengthy delay a zippo lighter is not a prohibited item transportation security administration richard reid tulane school of architecture united states congress zippo
